OpenFace
========

# Available modules


The overview below shows which OpenFace installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using OpenFace, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load OpenFace/2.2.0-foss-2021a
```
